nodes.text: Star Wars Omnibus: Clone Wars Volume 1: The Republic Goes to War

Clone Wars Volume 1 is an Star Wars Omnibus collection from Dark Horse Comics that reprints issues 49-54 and 61, 63 and 67 of Star Wars: Republic, along with the Star Wars: Jedi one shots Jedi: Mace Windu, Jedi: Shaak Ti, Jedi: Aayla Secura, and Jedi: Count Dooku. Routine Valor, previously published on Free Comic Book Day 2006, was originally scheduled to be in the omnibus, but was removed in the final version. The omnibus was published on August 22, 2012.

The Clone Wars explode across the galaxy! From the stormy seas of Kamino to the rocky hills of Devaron, the battle lines have been drawn, and the Jedi Knights who were once protectors of the peace must become generals, leading the clone armies of the Republic to war! These are the stories that were published immediately after the release of Attack of the Clones, featuring Jedi heroes Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, Mace Windu, and Quinlan Vos. Collects Clone Wars Volume 1: Defense of Kamino, Volume 2: Victories and Sacrifices, and Volume 4: Light and Dark, and Free Comic Book Day 2006.
